title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 4
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 4
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" MYR Group (MYRG). MYR Group Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day loss since 2008 after the electrical contractor's first-quarter results were disappointing. Earnings trailed analysts' lowest estimate in a Bloomberg survey even though revenue surpassed projections. MYR cited bad weather, along with delays for smaller projects.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
